newsitem.title: USA: Rutgers State Univ, N.J., won by Prudential.
newsitem.headline: Rutgers State Univ, N.J., won by Prudential.

text.p: Prudential Securities said it won $25.385 million of Rutgers State University, N.J., general obligation revenue bonds, 1997 Series A, with a true interest cost of 5.338 percent.
